page.title: 11Canford Heath.
page.content: Canford Heath is a fairly new residential area. Most of the houses are not older than twelve years old. North Canford Heath is a very new area with houses ranging from 0-6 years, whereas South Canford Heath is slightly older with houses ranging from eight to twelve years old. we have 4 schools on Canford Heath, three on South Canford Heath(1 middle, 1 first and a special school) and two on North Canford Heath (1 first and another Secondary School to be built). South Canford Heath has a range of shops as well as North Canford Heath. In South Canford Heath the shops consist of a Super-market and about \ a dozen small shops. There is also a Library,Surgery,Community Centre and a Post Office. North Canford Heath shops consist of a Super-market, \ a dozen other shops and a Travel Agents.
